SortAlgDemo
Class MergeSort

java.lang.Object
  SortAlgDemo.MergeSort
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, SortAlgorithm
public class MergeSort
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, SortAlgorithm

The MergeSort class is a class implementing the SortAlgorithm which performs sorting operation using Merge Sort algoritm. However this algorithm perform merge sort using "double-storage".
